business.headline: Global elites' wealth grew 3x faster in 2024; 4 new billionaires weekly: OxfamOxfam International, in its latest assessment of global inequality timed to the opening of the World Economic Forum meeting, also predicts at least five trillionaires will crop up over the next decade. A year ago, the group forecast that only one trillionaire would appear during that time.
Budget 2025: How can government make healthcare more affordableThe healthcare sector expects lowered costs on medical equipment in Budget 2025, thereby boosting affordability and accessibility.

Sensex, Nifty rally as banking stocks power markets higher; Zomato falls 7%Share Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex gained 454.11 points to close at 77,073.44, while the NSE Nifty50 added 141.55 points to end at 23,344.75.

Zomato shares decline 7% as Q3 profit tumbles over 57%Zomato Stock Price: Soon after the Q3 results were released, Zomato shares sharply declined over 7%, hitting a day's low of Rs 228.80. At market closing, the food delivery giant's shares fell 3.14% to Rs 240.95.

Budget 2025: New income tax bill likely to be introduced for simpler taxationThe bill will be introduced directly in Parliament, wherein stakeholder inputs including taxpayers and experts, would be incorporated, before being finalised.

Ian Bremmer sheds light on impact of Trump's second term In an exclusive interview with India Today TV, Ian Bremmer shared his insights on the implications of Donald Trump's second term for the US, India and the world.

Faster PF transfers, direct online claims: Check benefits of new EPFO rulesThe newly introduced measures are expected to minimise the turnaround time, thereby benefiting about 94% of the 13 million claims filed during FY 2024-25.

Sensex jumps 600 points. Why is stock market rising today?Stock market today: While volatility on Dalal Street rose during the trading session, gains in major shares such as Kotak Mahindra Bank, Wipro, Bajaj Finance, Bajaj Finserv, SBI and Reliance Industries contributed to the market gains.

Paytm Q3 FY25 results: Revenue surges to Rs 1,828 crore, gets closer to profitabilityThe growth was propelled by the company's robust payments business and an expanding portfolio in financial services distribution.

Laxmi Dental IPO listing: Shares open at 23% premium on D-Street. Hold or sell?  Laxmi Dental stock price: The shares of Laxmi Dental opened at Rs 528 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) reflecting a gain of 23.36% over its IPO price.

Laxmi Dental IPO listing: Shares to make strong market debut? Check GMP Laxmi Dental IPO saw bumper subscription numbers as investors flocked to bid for the public issue. The IPO received bids over 100 times.

EPFO simplifies fund transfers, personal detail corrections for membersWith the introduction of the revised process, it is expected that in future over 1.20 crore out of 1.30 crore total transfer claims would be directly forwarded to EPFO without requiring the employer's intervention.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: RG Kar rape-murder convict gets life term, court says 'not rarest of rare case'The CBI court on Monday sentenced Sanjay Roy to life imprisonment till death and a fine of Rs 50,000 for the rape and murder of a trainee doctor at Kolkata's RG Kar Hospital last year.

Trump to take oath as US President today, to start off second term with a bang  Live UpdatesTrump oath ceremony: Donald Trump is set to be sworn in as the 47th President of the United States today. He will hit the ground running in his second term, pledging to issue "close to 100" executive orders on his first day in office on hot-button issues.

How Mumbai Police found out Saif Ali Khan's attacker was a Bangladeshi nationalWhen the police confronted Shariful, he said that he was a resident of West Bengal. On probing further, Shariful was unable to give details of his residence and whereabouts in West Bengal.

Why Trump 2.0 shouldn't scare you. 5 big pointsThere's widespread apprehension surrounding Donald Trump's return to the Oval Office. However, his track record and promises show potential opportunities for economic growth, global stability, and pragmatic governance. Here's explained in five points, why Trump 2.0 might bring more balance than chaos.

Leave us alone: Kareena Kapoor Khan reacts to reel in now-deleted angry postIn a social media post, actor Kareena Kapoor Khan requested the media to respect her family's privacy following a knife attack on Saif Ali Khan. However, she deleted the post later.

Cold air emergency declared in Washington DC ahead of Trump's swearing-inDonald Trump Swearing In Ceremony Live Updates: Donald Trump will take the oath as the 47th President of the United States in an inauguration ceremony at the Capitol Rotunda in Washington DC on Monday (local time). The inauguration ceremony was shifted indoors because of the forecast of severe windchill. Ahead of the mega event, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar reached the United States to represent India. He also held meetings with his counterparts from Australia and Japan here during which they discussed bilateral issues and those pertaining to QUAD. Follow India Today for all the latest updates of Donald Trump's swearing-in ceremony.

Rohit Sharma, Yashasvi Jaiswal named in Mumbai squad for next Ranji Trophy gameIndia captain Rohit Sharma and opener Yashasvi Jaiswal were named in Mumbai's 17-member squad for their next Ranji Trophy encounter against Jammu and Kashmir.

Kerala woman, 24, sentenced to death for 2022 murder of boyfriend Sharon RajGreeshma, who was found guilty of murdering Sharon Raj by poisoning him in October 2022, was sentenced to death by a district sessions court in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala. Her uncle was sentenced to three years in jail for destroying evidence.

Jab Neeraj met Himani: Olympian's uncle shares couple's love story Neeraj Chopra's uncle, Surendra Chopra, revealed details about the Olympian's destination wedding in Shimla in an interview with India Today. The Olympic medallist tied the knot with his long-time girlfriend, Himani Mor, a former tennis player.

Day 9 Live Updates: Swiatek storms into quarters, Monfils retires hurt vs SheltonAustralian Open Day 9 Live Updates: Iga Swiatek decimates Eva Lys, a qualifier, 6-0, 6-1 to storm into the quarters. Gael Monfils's inspired run came to an end with an injury in the fourth round against Ben Shelton. Jannik Sinner defeated Holger Rune in his fourth round fixture at the Rod Laver Arena by 6-3, 3-6, 6-3, 6-2. Gael is also Monflis is in action vs Ben Shelton at Margaret Court Arena. On the other hand, Elena Rybakina got knocked out after losing against Madison Keys.

Will share research papers that prove cow urine's benefits: IIT Madras DirectorIIT Madras Director V Kamakoti stuck to his remarks on cow urine. He said he could present research papers that scientifically prove the benefits of cow urine.

RG Kar convict would have got death penalty if cops handled case: Mamata BanerjeeWest Bengal Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee claimed Kolkata Police could have secured the death penalty for the RG Kar convict and stated that she was not satisfied with the CBI court's verdict.

Delhi fighting confusion, not pollution, this winterFrequent imposition of crippling Grap restrictions without any formal communication has left Delhi NCR residents scrambling. Not only has it hit the livelihood of the poor, hefty traffic fines of Rs 20,000 have sown chaos in Delhi-NCR even as pollution persists this winter.

Saif Ali Khan attacker changed clothes, slept soundly after stabbing actor: PoliceThe Mumbai police on Sunday arrested the accused, Shariful Islam Shehzad Mohammad Rohilla Amin Fakir, a Bangladeshi national, in neighbouring Thane city.

40 years apart, Trump and Reagan's inauguration have one thing in commonRonald Reagan became the oldest President to take office at the age of 73. In 2021, outgoing President Joe Biden broke the record at the age of 78 years, And now Trump, who turned 78 in June 2024, will become the oldest person to start a presidential term.

Malaika Arora, Arjun Kapoor exit hospital together after visiting Saif Ali KhanFormer couple Arjun Kapoor and Malaika Arora visited actor Saif Ali Khan at Lilavati hospital on Sunday. Malaika is close friend of Saif's wife, actor Kareena Kapoor.

R Ashwin praises 'futuristic call' to appoint Shubman Gill as vice captainFormer India all-rounder Ravichandran Ashwin has praised the selectors' call to appoint Shubman Gill as the vice captain of the team for the Champions Trophy 2025.

Neymar en-route to Brazilian boyhood club Santos FC: ReportsBrazilian football icon Neymar is reportedly nearing a sensational return to his boyhood club Santos FC on an initial loan deal from Al Hilal, marking an emotional chapter in his illustrious career and reigniting hopes for his revival.

Gukesh draws second-round clash vs Vladimir Fedoseev in Tata Steel ChessD Gukesh held Slovenia's Vladimir Fedoseev to a draw in round two of the Tata Steel Chess Tournament, while Leon Luke Mendonca suffered his second consecutive defeat, highlighting a day of mixed results for Indian players.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.
